author: Lou Pasquarelli
comment: This is one of the best looking clock widgets out there. Plus the dev is very responsive. I emailed him with a couple feature requests (like American style date on the 1x1 widget and maybe an option for transparency). He responded within a day, with screenshots and explanations. Can't beat that.

reply.author: Giampaolo Russo
reply.content: Thank you. Your suggestions were very helpful. Version 1.6.0 has just been released.

author: Jon Murphy
comment: because u have found the best clock widget in the market place! If ur looking for a digital clock, this is it. It also has the date AND day of the week. Super clean, super easy, and best of all u can make it as small as 1x1!!! 5/5 no doubt. And I NEVER review apps

comment: The best compact yet stylish clock+date widget I've found for low-capacity tablets with 7“ screens.
title: Cute, stylish and low-resources

author: Brandon Bauman
comment: I really would like a date/time widget that would only take up a small slot,  freeing up space on my home screen. Update : Dev answered and more widget options are now available. This is the perfect Click app for me now. Good work!

reply.author: Giampaolo Russo
reply.content: Thanks. Since version 1.4.0 you can add AppWidgets small like icons ( size: 1x1 )

title: Solid App

author: Adrian Gutierrez
comment: Ok this is one of the nicest widgets I've ever seen. However, I do think it can be more customizable. Like allow the user to adjust the settings from the app icon, not by tapping on the widget. And add more ways of changing up the date. I love the colors and textures. Looks amazing on my Galaxy Note 2. Please I wanna keep this widget, just make those changes. Thanks.

reply.author: Giampaolo Russo
reply.content: Thanks for your suggestion. Using the new activity Hub (formerly Info), included in 1.7.x release, you can do that.
